definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: We are committed to carrying out settlement audit for construction engineering and calculating the construction cost impartially and fairly.
sentences.chinese: 对建设工程进行决算审计，公正公平地确定工程造价。

sentences.english: The project construction cost is refers carries on the complete expense which some engineering construction spends.
sentences.chinese: 工程造价是指进行某项工程建设所花费的全部费用。

sentences.english: The stoves are designed to have a lifetime of up to three years at a cost of about fifteen dollars.
sentences.chinese: 这个灶具的最常使用年限为3年，造价约15美元。

sentences.english: This kind of building construction technique will reduce the cost of construction and will help in lowering inflation.
sentences.chinese: 此类建造技术可以降低造价，有助于御制通货膨胀。

sentences.english: The idea never took off because it was prohibitively expensive.
sentences.chinese: 这一想法没有实现，因为它造价实在昂贵。

sentences.english: The grade-b qualification certificate to engage in the consulting of capital expenditure issued by the construction committee of shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山东省建设委员会颁发的工程造价咨询乙级资质证书。

sentences.english: The low-level arrangement of the deaerator can greatly reduce the engineering cost.
sentences.chinese: 除氧器低位露天布置可以大大降低工程造价。

sentences.english: It costs much to build this kind of building.
The cost of putting a cable underground is between four and ten times as much as that of carrying it on a pylon.
sentences.chinese: 地下铺设电缆的造价是架设高空线塔的四到十倍。

sentences.english: Besides, the beaching chassis is simple in structure and with a lower cost.
sentences.chinese: 另外，随船架结构简单，造价低，工程投资省。

sentences.english: The utility model has the advantages of simple structure, convenient operation, and low cost.
sentences.chinese: 喷灯结构简单，使用方便，造价低廉。

sentences.english: The cost of the building amounts to 10000 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 这屋的造价合计一万元。

sentences.english: The construction period is short, the cost is save, the treatment effect is good for this construction technology.
sentences.chinese: 该施工工艺，工期短，造价低，处理效果好。

sentences.english: As result, the idea of green building-based total cost management emerges.
sentences.chinese: 这样，基于绿色建筑的全面造价管理思想便产生了。

sentences.english: Stone walls are substantial replacements for stakes and logs, as their cost shows.
sentences.chinese: 石制城墙远比木墙坚固，当然亦造价不菲。

sentences.english: Budget and balance are effective means for controlling the construction cost.
sentences.chinese: 认真做好工程预结算编审工作是控制造价的有效保证。

definition: time allocated for a project/completion date
dead weight/weight capacity of a vehicle
